ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] No 49th song
ygData.msgSnippet: P.s. If you just want a song to annoy your group, we already have one.  Try Meliifious Motion sometime.  I remember the first time a higher level bard demo d
ygData.messageBody:
P.s. If you just want a song to annoy your group, we already have one. Try
Meliifious Motion sometime. I remember the first time a higher level bard
demo'd it to me. Right along the shore of Lake Rathe.

----- Original Message -----
From: "Sylly Songsynger" <jgs@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, May 04, 2000 8:20 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] No 49th song


> Ever been to the Maiden's Fancy?? I forget the name of the one in Grobb.
> And I dont even know the name of the one in Cabilis. And there is at
least
> one in East Freeport that have guards (yes multiple) in it. Prolly not the
> greatest idea for groups with mixed faction players.
>
> Sylly
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: "Webber, Jessica" <webber@...>
> To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
> Sent: Thursday, May 04, 2000 7:34 AM
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] No 49th song
>

> > > tavern in Norrath?
